msg.cartocraft.sealevel: Distance to the sea level: %s meter(s)
tooltip.cartocraft.barometer: Use this to confirm your altitude
tooltip.cartocraft.inferntant: Use this to confirm your position and altitude in the nether
tooltip.cartocraft.terratant: Use this towards the sun to confirm your position and altitude
tooltip.cartocraft.infernose: Use this to confirm your position in the nether
tooltip.cartocraft.terraose: Use this towards the sun to confirm your position
tooltip.cartocraft.voidose: Use this to confirm your position in the end
tooltip.cartocraft.voidtant: Use this to confirm your position and altitude in any dimension
